name: wporg-replace-helper
description: A set of scripts that help with replacing version numbers and other text for a WordPress.org plugin.

scripts.update-version-number: npm run wporg-replace-stable-tag && npm run wporg-replace-plugin-version && npm run wporg-replace-plugin-version-constant && npm run wporg-replace-package-version
scripts.wporg-replace-requires-at-least:
replace 'Requires at least:(\s+)([\.\d\w\-]*)
' "Requires at least:\$1$npm_config_minimum_wp
" $npm_config_plugin_file readme.txt
scripts.wporg-replace-tested-up-to:
replace 'Tested up to:(\s+)([\.\d\w\-]*)
' "Tested up to:\$1$npm_config_tested_wp
" $npm_config_plugin_file readme.txt
